          <title>
            <string language="en">The root system of plants living in different conditions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Wurzelsystem der Betriebe, die in den 
unterschiedlichen Bedingungen leben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système de racine des usines vivant dans 
différentes conditions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema da raiz das plantas que vivem em 
circunstâncias diferentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema della radice delle piante che vivono 
nelle circostanze differenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σύστημα ρίζας των εγκαταστάσεων που ζουν στους 
διαφορετικούς όρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El sistema de la raíz de las plantas que viven en
diversas condiciones</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show the root system of a plant living in a windy place (A), in a desert (B), and in a moist soil (C).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">desert</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">environment</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen das Wurzelsystem eines 
Betriebes, der in einem windigen Platz (a), in einer Wüste (b) und in
einem feuchten Boden (c) lebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent le système de racine 
d'une usine vivant dans un endroit venteux (a), dans un désert (b), 
et dans un sol moite (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram o sistema da raiz de 
uma planta que vive em um lugar ventoso (a), em um deserto (b), e em 
um solo húmido (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano il sistema della 
radice di una pianta che vive in un posto ventoso (a), in un deserto 
(b) ed in un terreno umido (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν σύστημα ρίζας 
εγκαταστάσεων ζωντανός σε μια θυελλώδη θέση (A), σε μια έρημο 
(B), και σε ένα υγρό χώμα (C).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran el sistema de la 
raíz de una planta que vive en un lugar ventoso (a), en un desierto 
(b), y en un suelo húmedo (c).</string>
          </description>
